title: Quiet Stillness
content:
Find peace -- not in perfection but in His presence. 
 In soft moments, in sacred stillness, where the world gets quiet... and God gets louder.

title: Cornerstone
content: Find strength—not in striving, but in surrender.In trials that test, in wisdom that whispers,where faith takes root… and love stands firm.For every stone of my life rests steady,when placed upon Him— the Cornerstone.
